# install.packages("tidyverse")
# remotes::install_github("allisonhorst/palmerpenguins")

Cargamos los paquetes que vamos a utilizar.
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

En la consola: ?palmerpenguins

Dandole un vistazo a la data:
```{r}
glimpse(penguins)
```

Para ver el tibble completo:
```{r}
View(penguins)
```

GGPLOT2:

```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, mapping = aes(x = sex)) +
  geom_bar()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, mapping = aes(x = )) +
  geom_bar()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, mapping = aes(x = , y =)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, mapping = aes(x = body_mass_g, fill = species)) +
  geom_histogram()
```

Probar color = species, size = species, shape = species.
